body:

Just a random post idea I wanted to share with you guys

Mine were 
eureka 
Breaking Bad
Doctor Who (Last seasons i got on disk, cant wait for the 12th doctor, cant say i will be thrilled to see a old man instead of David Tennant but that's what i said about Matt Smith, and i loved him!)
Sherlock
My Name Is Earl
Everybody Hates Chris (classic)

replies.body: Seriously??!?!?!? Its amazing! Filled with mystery's  about a group of people that are in a plane crash that crash on an island with, included but not limited to, polar bears, "The Others", Darma, Secrets that will uncover from all characters, and a weird smoke monster along with a giant statue that was knocked down and all that was left was a stone foot.
